00032 class Shape : public Referencable
00033 {
00034 protected:
00039      bool mProjected;
00040 
00045      int mChanges;
00046 
00047 public:
00048      Shape();
00049      Shape(const Reference& ref);
00050 
00052      virtual ~Shape() {}
00053 
00057      void touch() { mChanges++; }
00058 
00064      bool projected() const { return mProjected; }
00065 
00071      int changes() const { return mChanges; }
00072 
00076      virtual void toProj() { toProj(*Projection::currentProjection()); }

00084

00199 class Circle : public Shape {
00200 protected:
00201      LatLng mCenter;    
00202      double mRadius;   
00203 
00204 public:
00212      Circle(const LatLng l, double r, const Reference& ref) : Shape(ref), mCenter(l), mRadius(r) {}
00213      Circle(const LatLng l, double r);
00214 
00216      virtual ~Circle() {}
00217 
00223      void toProj(const Projection &proj) { mProjected = true; }
00224 
00231      void toCoord(const Projection &proj) { mProjected = false; }
00232 
00233      void cells(const BasicGrid &g, std::list<GridPos> &outCells) const;
00234 
00240      LatLng cenCoord() const { return mCenter; }
00241 
00248      ProjCoord cenProj() const { return mCenter.toCoord(); }
00249      void boundingBox(double &t, double &l, double &b, double &r) const;
00250 
00256      double area() const { return mRadius * mRadius * kPi; }
00257 
00264      void move(double dx, double dy) {
00265           if (dx != 0 || dy != 0) {
00266                mCenter = LatLng(mCenter.lat() + dy, mCenter.lng() + dx);
00267                mChanges++;
00268           }
00269      }
00270 
00276      void move(LatLng newPos) {
00277           if (newPos != mCenter) {
00278                mCenter = newPos;
00279                mChanges++;
00280           }
00281      }
00282 
00288      Shape* clone() const {
00289           Circle *r = new Circle(mCenter, mRadius, ref());
00290           r->mProjected = mProjected;
00291           r->mChanges = mChanges;
00292           return r;
00293      }
00294 
00300      const std::string type() const { return "Circle"; }
00301 
00307      double radius() const { return mRadius; }
00308 
00309      std::ostream& toXML(std::ostream &o, std::string indent) const;
00310 
00311      // Friends
00313      friend std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream &o, const Circle &c);
00314 };
